name: Paul Johnston - current focus: moving electrons

content.html: My thinking was that GDS would be a learning organisation, or at least one willing to listen. Some parts did. Many parts did not. This had consequences. Technical consequences and "need to refactor" consequences. I realised I had only enough energy for limited fights.
content.value:
My thinking was that GDS would be a learning organisation, or at least one willing to listen.

Some parts did. Many parts did not.

This had consequences. Technical consequences and "need to refactor" consequences. 

I realised I had only enough energy for limited fights.
